data.title: Bitcoin and ether rise, trimming November losses as tech stocks rally: CNBC Crypto World
data.description: On today's episode of CNBC Crypto World, digital currencies rise as tech stocks rally on Wall Street. Plus, new research finds stablecoin market caps have grown as investors look for save havens amid increased volatility. And, Matt Savarese, head of digital assets at Nasdaq, sits down with CNBC Crypto World from the Clear Street Disruptive Technology Conference in Palm Beach, Florida to discuss the exchange's efforts to integrate digital assets.
